Package no.ntnu.idatt1005.foodi.view.components.button

Class StandardCheckBoxHandler<DataT>

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatt1005.foodi.view.components.button.StandardCheckBoxHandler<DataT>
Type Parameters:
DataT - The type of data the checkboxes represent
public class StandardCheckBoxHandler<DataT> extends Object
Class for handling a group of checkboxes, and a main checkbox that controls them.
Version:
1.1
Author:
Leif MÃ¸rstad
